ADC_PAGE_STATE Body

Implementation of the ADC_PAGE_STATE logic

Author

Juergen Sieben, ConDeS GmbH

Private constants

* /** Constants: C_ITEM - Generic page item (String) C_APP_ITEM - Application item C_NUMBER_ITEM - Number page item C_DATE_ITEM - Date page item

Types
session_value_rec
Properties
string_value

Actual value of the item as VARCHAR2

date_value

Actual value of the item as DATE, if possible

number_value

Actual value of the item as NUMBER, if possible

Private methods
get_mandatory_default_value
function get_mandatory_default_value(
p_cgr_id in adc_rule_groups.cgr_id%type,
p_cpi_id in adc_page_items.cpi_id%type
)
return varchar2

Method to retrieve a default value for a mandatory page item.

Is used to retrieve the default value if a mandatory item is NULL and  a default value was defined.

Parameters
p_cgr_id
in adc_rule_groups.cgr_id%type

ID of the rule group. Required to retrieve format mask and default value

p_cpi_id
in adc_page_items.cpi_id%type

ID of the page item

Returns

Default value for that page item.
